description: Lists the prepared statements in the specified workgroup.

parameters.name: WorkGroup
parameters.description: The workgroup to list the prepared statements for.

nested_items.name: PreparedStatements
nested_items.description: The list of prepared statements for the workgroup.

nested_items.name: StatementName
nested_items.description: The name of the prepared statement.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The last modified time of the prepared statement.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token generated by the Athena service that specifies where to continue pagination if a previous request was truncated. To obtain the next set of pages, pass in the NextToken from the response object of the previous page call.
